alert.unauthorizedMesage: Your session has expired, please log in
alert.enrollmentSuccessMessage: You successfully enrolled for this class!
alert.enrollmentCancellConfirmation: You are trying to cancell the class less then an 24 hours - you won't be able to reuse this class. Are you sure you want to proceed this operation?

errors.403: You don't have access to this resource
errors.1: Enrollment you're trying to cancell doesn't exist

schedule.basicSchedule: Here you will see the basic schedule for a week. Pay attention - the schedule could be changed for different reasons (the coach can't give class, this is a holiday, etc.). Check the current schedule on the first schedule slide by selecting a date you are interested in.

pattern.password: A password should be at least 8 symbols long, contain a capital letter and a digit

payments.noPayments: You have no active payments. Choose and pay your subscription to enjoy your classes with us

personals.description: We offer you a private class service. Create your dream class. Pay attention! When a coach confirms the class you should pay the whole price - only then the class will be activated and added to a schedule. Also we offer private classes pass.
